wikipedia_page.main: Steve Galloway (born 13 February 1963) is an English football coach and former player. He is currently the assistant manager of Umeå FC.As a player, Galloway played professionally in England, Scotland and Sweden.

response: * Steve Galloway (born 1963), English football coach and former player
